ygData.subject: Spell Search
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings All. I am Shaopaul from the land of Innoruuk. Having recently acquired the the 16th rank, I am experiencing some difficulty in finding the spells
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings All.
I am Shaopaul from the land of Innoruuk. Having recently acquired the the
16th rank, I am experiencing some difficulty in finding the spells required
for my trade. I am a gnome necromancer who was born and raised in Akanon. I
have just returned from travels to Qeynos to purchase all of the level 16
spells. The guild had:
Cure Disease
Cancel Magic
Shielding
Heart Flutter
Shieldskin
Spirit Armour

Regretfully, the guild does not have
Resltess Bones!!!
Banshee Aura
Feign Death
Hungry Earth.

If anyone knows where these spells can be found, please let me know. I have
searched all of Akanon and am losing the life that once drove me. My undying
gratitude to any who answer the call.

Shaopaul
